Platform.Title: UBEC Operon Array Ready E. coli Oligonucleotide set 1.0 [Oligo ID version]
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: The 70-mer oligonucleotide array was constructed, containing 6112 oligonucleotides that sampled chromosomal genes identified in the genome sequences of E. coli strains K-12 MG1655, O157:H7 VT2 Sakai, and O157:H7 EDL933 and plasmid genes from the two genome-sequenced O157:H7 strains (the Operon Array Ready E. coli Oligonucleotide set 1.0, Qiagen- Operon, Hilden, Germany). 12 positive and 12 negative control oligonucleotides were also included. The oligonucleotides were resuspended in 3 X SSC buffer and printed on to Corning GAPS II slides (Corning B.V Life Sciences, Schiphol-Rijk, Netherlands ) using a Biorobotics Microgrid TAS array printer. Amersham Lucidea array controls (Amersham Biosciences Ltd, Little Chalfont, UK) were printed in each subarray. After printing, slides were briefly rehydrated in steam, dried at 100oC, and UV-cross-linked according to the manufacturer's instructions. Slides were stored desiccated and in the dark until use.
Platform.Description: Alternative version of GPL1246 [this version based on unique oligo ids].

Column.Name: pO157_ORF_Name
Column.Description: E.coli O157 Sakai pO157 ORF name

Sample.Title: BW wt pH7 A

Channel.Extract-Protocol: Qiagen extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Channel.Label: cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: Labelled cDNA was hybridised on E.coli custom made arrays.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Following labelling , 80pmoles of labelled probe was hybridized for 16 hr at 42C on E.coli whole genome arrays. GeneChips were washed using Adwawash.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Perkin-Elmer Scanarray Scanner 4200.
Sample.Description: Gene expression data from E.coli K12 at pH7 control E.coli K12 pH7 wildtype biological rep1
Sample.Data-Processing: The data were analyzed with Scanarray express microarray analysis system and quantile normalization was used in R package to normalise the data.

Series.Title: Characterisation of modular response of E. coli Keio collection mutant library to acid adaptation
Series.Summary:
To study the dynamics of acid adaptation in E.coli Keio collection mutant library at pH7 and pH5.5 after 15 minutes of adaptation
Keywords: Single channel hybridisation were carried out using cy5 dye.
Series.Overall-Design: Samples were collected from steady state system at pH7 and at pH5.5 after 15 minutes of adaptation
